products.title: Sakura Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Silver Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Capella, Carbon Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The wonderful thing about carbon silver is that it manages to combine the charm and sophistication of two metallic finishes in perfect harmony. The silver shines under the light, and the carbon provides balance and stability that allows you to transition between more luxurious pieces as you move around the room. Use carbon silver in the dining room where it can partner your new glass dining table with chrome frame.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Their shadow grey striped midas fabric is a mid-dark grey shaded blind. Perfect for making a statement within the home. Product id: sdb-rbx2284 fabric colour: shadow grey material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes midas stripe blackout shadow grey roller blind in white/grey.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Roller Blind
products.description: The natural weave of the anthology in moonstone gives you the best of it all; the benefits of a high quality dim-out blind, plus a light, outdoorsy feel. The grainy, woven fabric provides a blind that's built to last. Beige will match almost any dcor scheme, but the moonstone will look especially stylish in a contemporary country dining room, surrounded by deep browns and soft creams, or set against bolder reds in a cosy bedroom, where you can curl up and relax.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too. The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior.

products.title: Dune, Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Capella, Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Faux Suede Charcoal Curtain
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede charcoal curtain in a lovely greycolour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. products.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Cotswold, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. products.title: Serino Blackout Carbon Rigid Pvc 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Serino blackout is made from rigid pvc and is perfect for bathrooms and commercial environments at a very affordable price. This grey vertical blind is made from rigid pvc slats that require no weights or chains, the perfect choice for bathrooms or commercial environments. Product id: db-dvtb1126 fabric colour: carbon material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating headrail: metal headrail slat width: 89mm control type: wand and cord energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes serino blackout carbon rigid pvc 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Mayfair Taupe Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required mayfair taupe dimout perfect fit.

products.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace.

products.title: Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Update your windows with the exquisite mayfair grey dimout perfect fit, for a charming look to your windows. The smooth grey tone is dappled only by the light and shadow of the blind's ripping pleats, to give an ultra-textured look that would go beautifully with other tactile grey fabrics within your interior. The frame is designed to be a perfect colour match for white and anthracite upvc windows, so the installed blind will look like a seamless part of your windows.

products.title: Vassal Mist Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: For something a little different, vassal mist twins a vintage and nautical feel, to create a muted grey blind with the gentlest touch of green. The colour is created with tiny dense checks that can only be seen up close, for flawless continual colouration when standing back. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories.

products.title: Soho Slate Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Soho slate dimout perfect fit features fabric built out of overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and energetic slate tone. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, creating a dark sparkle effect as the light shines through. The innovative perfect fit system clips in flush against your window with no need for tools or drilling, and removes from your window without leaving a trace, for easy cleaning of the blind or room.

These grey curtains are made from 100% cotton and are bang on trend so will add a stylish, modern and elegant feel to any room in your home.
